title: The Chinese Virus … from CHINA | Guest: Bill O’Reilly | 3/20/20
description:
The mainstream media are effectively parroting Chinese propaganda by insisting that the term “Chinese virus” is racist, so Trump is trolling them HARD. The U.S. is doing way better against the coronavirus than other developed countries, and we self-quarantined voluntarily! Bill O’Reilly joins the program to discuss the economic fallout of businesses being shuttered and what the tipping point for Trump’s re-election might be. In today’s COVID-19 update, governors are ordering shutdowns, and Senator Richard Burr is in deep trouble for insider trading. America must remember, we have a right to assembly! The issue on full display in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Pastor Tony Spell joins with the latest on the fight to keep his church open. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
